TITLE: Social Task
DEF: Engage in interpersonal communication, collaboration, or problem-solving
TASK: The Social Tasks pattern supports activities that engage students in interpersonal communication, collaboration, or problem-solving. This pattern fosters essential soft skills development, teamwork, and a deeper understanding of diverse perspectives. Challenges may involve ensuring clearly defined roles, collaborative goal-setting, and constructive feedback. For successful implementation, set clear expectations, promote openness, and use AI to facilitate these collaborative processes.
